description: Oh there is tickling, and flogging, but hey, we are here to make the girl suffer. There is no better torture then orgasm torture, when you make someone cum and cum and cum. When that person has no control over whether they cum or not. When you rip orgasm after orgasm out of them. There is a moment when they realize that can't stop the orgasms and they understand that it is slowly causing them to suffer. Not just any suffering, the ultimate suffering. Suffering that will never stop, pleasure that is so good it's painful. The sweet release into the darkness... a very loud and violent release, but a release none the less.
title: Alicia Stone
